backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with access control, user profiles, user preferences, and chat rooms/messages, including CRUD APIs with authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function converting old user profiles to the new profile and preference formats during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten textual summaries of all frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using a warm OKLCH palette.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React application into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile setup/editing, settings, room selection, and theme/polling application.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating with Internet Identity and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Message input form that validates, submits messages, and supports Enter/Shift+Enter shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageThre: Displays chat messages for a room with auto‑scroll, loading skeletons, error state, and a composer when a room is selected.
frontend/src/components/chat/RoomList.ts: Lists chat rooms, allows creating a new room, and handles loading, error, and selection states.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Dialog for editing user profile fields and avatar colors with live preview and save handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Initial setup dialog that collects a display name and bio and saves a default avatar profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a circular avatar using profile colors and initials with configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Dialog for updating user preferences such as theme and message polling interval, applying changes immediately.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatRooms.ts: Provides hooks to list rooms and create new rooms using the backend actor with React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state and persistent identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMessages.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and poll room messages and to post new messages using React Query and an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserPreferences.ts: Implements hooks to get and update caller-specific user preferences with defaults and React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update user profiles, including the caller’s profile and cached lookups for other users.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom light/dark OKLCH color theme with global styling variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wiring QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider around the root component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and CSS variables.
project_state.json: Metadata describing current project state, features, and versioning for a chat application.
